title: Season 4, Episode 1 // I'm Gonna Set the Law on Gire
description:
Geoff, Gavin, and Andrew talk about Gavin pulling a visual joke on an audio podcast, a technical nightmare, a season change, and becoming a true crime podcast. Is this the worst episode? Welcome to Season 4.
If you want to send your towel cards in, send to: Infinity Towel, 1901 e. 51st st, Austin, TX 78724
Want to contribute to bits? Email what you can do to ffacebits@gmail.com
